responsibilities: Provides hair cutting, styling, and treatments.
Consults with clients on desired hairstyles and recommends suitable options.
Maintains cleanliness and sanitation of tools and work area.
description: Our professional hairstylists offer personalized haircuts and treatments tailored to your style. From trims to transformations, we ensure you leave feeling confident and refreshed.

responsibilities: Provides manicures and pedicures.
Applies nail art, extensions, and other nail treatments.
Ensures proper sanitation of tools and equipment.
description: Our expert nail technicians provide top-tier manicure and pedicure services, from classic styles to intricate nail art, ensuring that your hands and feet look their best.

responsibilities: Provides skincare treatments like facials and exfoliation.
Recommends skincare routines and products.
Performs hair removal services such as waxing.
description: Our estheticians offer comprehensive skincare treatments, including facials and hair removal services, to keep your skin glowing and smooth. Personalized consultations available.

responsibilities: Applies makeup for events, photoshoots, and special occasions.
Consults with clients on desired looks and styles.
Keeps up-to-date with makeup trends and products.
description: Our makeup artists specialize in creating flawless looks for any occasion, from weddings to photoshoots. Using top-quality products, we ensure a long-lasting, perfect look.

responsibilities: Provides various massage techniques for relaxation and therapy.
Assesses clients' soft tissue condition and joint quality.
Maintains client records and treatment plans.
description: Our massage therapists offer therapeutic and relaxation massages tailored to your needs. Whether you seek relief from tension or a relaxing escape, our team is here to help.

responsibilities: Shapes and styles eyebrows using various techniques.
Provides services like threading, waxing, and tinting.
Advises clients on brow maintenance and care.
description: Our eyebrow specialists offer a variety of shaping and tinting techniques to achieve the perfect brow. From threading to waxing, we customize each service to your needs.

responsibilities: Specializes in hair coloring techniques.
Consults with clients to determine desired color outcomes.
Applies hair dyes, highlights, and color corrections.
description: Our colorists are experts in creating stunning color transformations, from subtle highlights to bold color changes. Each session begins with a thorough consultation to achieve the perfect look.
